sentence.text: Genes involved in tissue development, differentiation, and oncogenesis such as protein refolding, cartilage development, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, diet induced thermogenesis, positive regulation of transcription, DNA-templated, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, and peptidyl-proline hydroxylation to 4-hydroxy-L-proline were hypermethylated in both RMS cell lines and primary samples, implicating aberrant DNA methylation in the pathogenesis of rhabdomyosarcoma.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: These results suggest that DNA methylation signatures may somatic diversification of immunoglobulins in the diagnosis and risk stratification of pediatric rhabdomyosarcoma and help identify new targets for therapy
